author: JJ
text: I am in love with city :)

author: nassima
text: Tres belle ville, Que du bonheur . Merci Mes amis pour le bon accueil et cette magnific experience

author: Paris
text: Unclean city , really bad experience . Can't wait to go back home to Algeria

author: tteaze
text: This part of the city was carefully rebuilt as it used to be before the war. It is a beautiful part of town. Hard to believe it was all reconstructed only 60 years ago! I recommend to visit old town for a day stay here for lunch or dinner you will find it cheaper then anywhere else in Bay Area !

author: tteaze
text: Don’t visit Oakland, and whatever you do DO NOT MOVE THERE! For a city in such a major metropolitan area there is relatively no culture. The food is terrible - there are no good restaurants and even less variety. Not to mention the hipsters. There are sooooo many hipsters, and that’s just inherently very scary.
